title: C# WPF - StringFormat issue
body:
My visualstudio 2013 express is complaining about, a lot of character unexpected, etc, and it does not compile when I have StringFormat='{0}.' in my binding.

However it is just fine if i change it to StringFormat=' {0}.'

Checked MSDN but doesnt say anything really. I just tried again with a plain new WPF project and window with a string property and datacontext set to this. Same problem.
